featured.text: Chinese writer Lu Yu wrote in A.D. 780 that there were “tens of thousands” of teas.

definition.zh_def: 一種魚類，通常指淡水魚，特別是在中國和其他亞洲地區常見的魚。
definition.en_def: A type of fish, typically referring to freshwater fish, especially common in China and other parts of Asia.
definition.example: The chef prepared a delicious dish using fresh yu from the market.
